Text: thank you so much! Do you have the possibility to upload the first 2 episodes from season 2? Would be really great as nobody else is releaseing this series during the canada airing. The US airing is soooo much delayed.

S02E01 and S02E02 aired last year. One was a Halloween special and the other a Christmas special.  I doubt YTV will repeat them anytime soon, but if they do I will see what I can do.  

I'm not making any promises about continuing with this show. Most of the people downloading it aren't sharing back.  It's been less than 24 hours since I posted it, it's been downloaded over 70 times, yet only 8 people are sharing it (as I type this).  Makes me think: Why Bother?
thanks, please continue, will help seed.
Would LOVE to see more of this show......
I will place in my seedbox if you upload more and leave it seeding .
